document_data.name: Buhrell Caah
document_data.mainbody: '''Buhrell Caah''' was an agent of the [[Emerald Enclave]] in [[Phlan]] during the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.History: Buhrell was an agent of the Emerald Enclave sent to Phlan. He went to [[Madame Freona's Tea Kettle]] searching for a powerful and dangerous magical item. With the help of some adventurers  he managed to locate and recover the item.{{Cite adventurers league/Defiance in Phlan|23}}
